title: Chuck asked to sign a petition then for donation

content.question: Chuck is walking down the street and someone asks him to sign a petition to put clean-air legislation on the next ballot. He decides to sign the petition. Then the person asks whether he would like to give a donation to the associated environmental group. This technique is known as which of the following?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
